content: मिश्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मिश्र्-अच्] {@--1@} Mixed, blended, mingled, combined; गद्यं पद्यं च मिश्रं च तत् त्रिधैव व्यवस्थितं <ls>Kāv. 1. 11</ls>, <ls n="Kāv. 1.">31</ls>, <ls n="Kāv. 1.">32</ls>; <ls>R. 16. 32.</ls> {@--2@} Associated, connected. {@--3@} Manifold, diverse. {@--4@} Tangled, intertwined. {@--5@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Having a mixture of, consisting for the most part of. {@--6@} Mixing, adulterating. --श्रः {@--1@} A respectable or worthy person; usually affixed to the names of great men and scholars; आर्यमिश्राः प्रमाणं <ls>M. 1</ls>; वसिष्ठमिश्रः, मंडनमिश्रः &c. {@--2@} A kind of elephant {@--3@} The group of the constellations कृत्तिका and विशाखा. --श्रं {@--1@} A mixture. {@--2@} A kind of radish.
